fields.name: ClientCertificate
fields.description: Base64-encoded certificate used to authenticate a Service Principal

fields.name: ClientCertificatePassword
fields.description: The password for the certificate used to authenticate a Service Principal

fields.name: ClientCertificateSendChain
fields.description: Specifies whether to include x5c header in client claims when acquiring a token to enable subject name / issuer based authentication for the Client Certificate

fields.name: ClientId
fields.description: The client Id for authenticating a Service Principal.

fields.name: ClientSecret
fields.description: The client secret for authenticating a Service Principal

fields.name: TenantId
fields.description: The tenant Id for authenticating a Service Principal
